name: Pedersen & Partners
description: Pedersen & Partners is a leading global Executive Search & Leadership Consulting firm, focused on finding top talent for our clients across Europe, Asia, Africa, the Middle East and the Americas. We pride ourselves on being precise with placements, offering our clients the complete package both in terms of industry expertise and reach. Our team of Executive Search consultants comprises 50 nationalities across 54 offices around the world bringing our clients the best of both local and internationally sourced talent to make the right executive appointments in each market.
Headline: Pedersen & Partners is a leading global Executive Search and Leadership Consulting firm.
ShortDescription: Pedersen & Partners is a leading global Executive Search and Leadership Consulting firm. We operate 54 wholly owned offices in 50 countries across Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Asia & the Americas.
enhanced_description: Pedersen & Partners is a leading global Executive Search and Leadership Consulting firm specializing in identifying and placing top executive talent for enterprise-level clients worldwide. With a comprehensive service offering that includes InSight Leadership Assessment, Leadership Consulting, and Executive Market Mapping, the firm leverages its extensive global presence across 54 wholly-owned offices in 50 countries, staffed by a diverse team of 50 nationalities, to provide both local and internationally sourced talent solutions and leadership development expertise. Established in 2001 and headquartered in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, Pedersen & Partners aims to help clients fill open executive positions more quickly and precisely.
key_use_cases: Conducting leadership assessments for executive roles
Gaining insights into executive talent markets through market mapping
Accelerating the hiring process for executive positions
competitive_advantages: Global reach with 54 wholly owned offices in 50 countries across Europe, Asia, Africa, the Middle East, and the Americas
Diverse team of Executive Search consultants comprising 50 nationalities
Specialization in executive appointments and top talent
Comprehensive package including industry expertise and global reach
Access to both local and internationally sourced talent
roi_benefits: Access to a global pool of top executive talent
primary_users: HR Executives (e.g., CHROs, VP of Talent Acquisition)
